sc.server.network

Class Client

  • java.lang.Object
    • XStreamClient
      • sc.server.network.Client
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IClient

    public class Client
extends XStreamClient
implements IClient
    A generic client. This represents a client in the server. Clients which connect to the server (as separate programs or running as threads started by the server) are represented by sc.networking.clients.LobbyClient.
